Soundglove: Multisensory Exploration of Everyday Objects

Soundglove combines the hand with the ear, allowing users to turn every object into an instrument to explore, sonify, and record. Soundglove was developed as a final project for INFO C265 â€“ Interface Aesthetics and was published and presented at the CHI 2018 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems.

Client

Academic Project
